title: Ilaoi needs some serious nerf.
body: She is tanky and deals way too much damage.You get caught by her e and random tentacles starts appearing everywhere and starts hitting you.You go all out on her and she basically just press R & Q....BOOOM PENTAKILL.Her health regen is also insane,you almost kill her and then next minut her health bar rises up again.Defuk rito.

replies.body: got dun 800 ad nuke @ 11 mins or soething ad v pantheon G_G

The key to beating her is dodging her Q and her tentacle, her ult has a range limit so you can basically dash out of it  she would basically be wasting it if you manage to dodge it. She is very tanky and her damage is really high but she need to hit her E on you then her tentacle do the work. My suggestion would probably be try and dodge her skill shot and not to get too close to her , if you're melee just try to keep distant and when she blow her cd , go on her
She does insane damage only if she hit her skillshot , if she doesn't she is dead most of the time

> [{quoted}](name=Corsage,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jaPNERr3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-16T13:34:52.860+0000)

My suggestion would probably be try and dodge her skill shot and not to get too close to her , if you're melee just try to keep distant and when she blow her cd , go on her
> She does insane damage only if she hit her skillshot , if she doesn't she is dead most of the time

However if you are someone like zed who's ult makes you appear behind your target your almost useless.You ult her she ults then you w away.By the time you try dishing out damage your ult has popped and her insane health regen starts poppin.
